Articles.Content:
When adding a game save I give the Titles that are something like this, Moon Mission 1, Moon Mission 2...etc.. When adding the next title of a Game Save I often can''t remember which save should be next because I have a few projects titled this way. I would like to suggest the List of Game Saves be shown during the time of a Game Save.

I did some research and didn't find this topic, I apologize if it's been mentioned already.
I've had this problem as well. So long as it doesn't do that meta information thing so it takes forever.
